description:
• Independent Linux distribution created by a former maintainer of NetBSD.
• Uses [xbps](https://github.com/voidlinux/xbps) as its package manager (rolling release) and the [runit](http://smarden.org/runit/index.html) init system.
• Only free software officially supported, but an unofficial repository is available for nonfree packages
• First distribution to ship [LibreSSL](https://www.libressl.org/) as its cryptography library
• Allows for the use of both glibc and musl
• Semi-questionable leadership.
- Previous project leader disappeared without warning.
- Previous project leader was in control of ***all*** of Void Linux's assets.
- Void Linux had to regain control of their github and create a new URL for their website because of this.
**Package manager**: `xbps`

[Download Void Linux](https://voidlinux.org/download/)
